name: Consult_Model
description: Consult a more capable AI model when you are stuck or the task exceeds your abilities. You MUST first try to solve the problem yourself and describe what you attempted. Two modes: 'advisor' returns text guidance for you to follow, 'takeover' lets the consultant execute tools and solve it directly (streaming results to the user). Use sparingly - limited to 2 consults per session.

mode.description: advisor: get text advice and continue yourself. takeover: consultant runs tools to solve it directly.

goal.description: What you are trying to accomplish (1-2 sentences)

what_tried.description: What approaches you already tried and why they failed

context.description: Relevant context: error messages, tool outputs, constraints

specific_ask.description: Your specific question or request for the consultant
